mapper.insert: insert into member (num, id, pwd, name, email, domain, phone1, phone2, phone3, zipcode, address, sex, visit, icon, state, regdate) values (member_num_seq.nextval, #{id}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{email}, #{domain}, #{phone1}, #{phone2}, #{phone3}, #{zipcode}, #{address}, #{sex}, #{visit}, #{icon}, 1, sysdate)
mapper.update: update member set pwd = #{pwd}, name = #{name}, email = #{email}, domain = #{domain}, phone1 = #{phone1}, phone2 = #{phone2}, phone3 = #{phone3}, zipcode = #{zipcode}, address = #{address}, sex = #{sex}, visit = #{visit} where id=#{id}
